```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library('tidyverse')
library('ggrepel')
library('leaflet')
library('sf')
library('raster')
library('rgdal')
library('ggmap')
geom_points <- read.csv()

```

```{r dataset, echo=FALSE}
summary(geom_points)
str(geom_points)
```

```{r}
m1 <- get_stamenmap( bbox = c(left = 110, bottom = -45, right = 160, top = -10),
zoom = 4, maptype = "terrain-background")
ggmap(m1)
```
